@abhayka @APompliano That is a good question. We await guidance on this matter from the regulators. When is a token deemed community property? #Bitcoin sets a high standard that will be difficult for others to emulate. Satoshi seems to have been well versed in securities law & monetary ethics.

@APompliano If a token is deemed a security, that would likely make it illegal to trade (because none of the relevant disclosures have taken place) & unethical for a public figure to promote (because it violates ethics rules regarding conflicts of interest for nearly all elected officials).
